website_summaries.verdict: Easy, straightforward recipes that conform to DASH diet recommendations, making it easy for you to create delicious, healthy dishes that can lead to better health and weight loss.
pros: Each recipe is designed to be made in 30 min
Bonus meal planning and grocery shopping advice
Helps you understand how to maximize flavor and taste in healthy recipes
cons: Book is a bit dry, without much personality

customer_reviews.title: Truth in Advertising
customer_reviews.text: Imagine opening a cookbook that sounds like the answer to healthy eating and then discover it's so. Based on scientific research and sound practice in developing the recipes, "The Quick & Easy DASH Diet Cookbook" delivers on its promise to provide recipes that are do-able and within reason when it comes to finding the proper ingredients. This book is great for anyone with health issues to tackle, but it's just plain good for anyone who wants a fresh approach to their diet that will also provide rewards as far as blood pressure, blood sugar levels and cholesterol are concerned. If your interest is better eating and good health, this book is a must.
customer_reviews.author: bj

customer_reviews.title: Good recipes and missing info
customer_reviews.text: My husband was put on the DASH diet to help regulate his blood pressure. PROS: - variety of recipes are good. - there are new things we are going to try. CONS: - there are no pictures to assist with visualization for those on the diet. - there are NO exchanges on here. If you are looking to see how many portions of grains, fruits, vegetables, etc. each recipes has you will be VERY disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A New Lifestyle You'll Crave!
customer_reviews.text: Welcome to a diet that does not dictate unreasonable restrictions to live a healthy lifestyle. Backed up by studies done by the National Institute of Health, the DASH Diet is one that actually works! Even though this diet is specifically targeted towards people with hypertension, it also aids in reducing weight loss, lowering cholesterol, and preventing cancer. This cookbook offers advice on meal planning, foods to avoid, how to stock your pantry, and recipes that adhere to the plan, in a way that is completely easy to incorporate into your daily lifestyle. From the peanut butter banana smoothie, to the sweet potato salad, to the grilled halibut and tropical fruit salad, you will crave this way of living!
customer_reviews.author: Brittani H

customer_reviews.title: Loving Good, Nutritious Food Plans
customer_reviews.text: DASH Diet Cookbook seeks to prevent or manage hypertension. Serious health problems connect to high blood pressure tendencies. Millions of dollars in research performed by the best possible minds give folks who “seize the day” simple, easy, smart, nutritious food suggestions. Isn't it wise to try and prevent disease with foods based on rock solid science? 77 delicious, simple, quick and nutritious recipes are provided in this content. Many more smart suggestions help you to plan, organize, and launch your lifestyle improvements quickly. The “Warm Sweet Potato Salad with Balsamic Vinaigrette” recipe offers a colorful, delicious, tasty dish. Your relentless involvement in managing this critical facet of living well is all that’s missing.
customer_reviews.author: trinity

customer_reviews.title: Helpful explanations on healthy eating
customer_reviews.text: Losing weight is a great side effect of dieting, but "The Quick & Easy DASH Diet Cookbook: 77 DASH Diet Recipes Made in Minutes" shows you not only how you can safely drop pounds but also explains how this way of eating can help treat high blood pressure, lower your cholesterol and help curb the threat of various diseases likes diabetes and cancer. Eating less salt and fat are key components of DASH, which stands for Dietary Approaches to Stop Hypertension, but the book doesn't explicitly label foods as "good" or "bad." It does, however, explain very plainly why you should limit or increase your intake of certain items.
customer_reviews.author: Esan Prime

customer_reviews.title: Secret to eating healthy unveiled!
customer_reviews.text: Struggling with high blood pressure and the likelihood of hypertension – Dash diet to the rescue; I cannot believe that I could not put the kindle down until I got to the last page. From the clear explanation of dash diet, the impact on high blood pressure to extracting all the wonderful minerals that performs the miracle in human system. I like the explanation behind attaining dash diet; how to build a grocery list and sticking with it. There can be nothing more transparent on my plate than knowing the quantity of salt I am putting inside my body-the book exposed everything in black and white. For me, I just build a new list of "delicately" delicious healthy desserts!
customer_reviews.author: Kasali Ajadi

customer_reviews.title: Black Bean Brownies!
customer_reviews.text: Here is yet another cookbook for the novice chef. Advancing the current trend of eating your way to better health, the anonymous authors present some crafty ways to disguise the fact that salt, certain fats and sugar are off limits. The 77 DASH recipes (the acronym stands for Dietary Approaches to Stop Hypertension) offer tricky alternatives, like the Surprisingly Healthy Brownie made primarily of black beans. The opening pages are filled with the standard advice everyone already knows, like make a shopping list before you go shopping, plan meals ahead and watch your portion sizes. You can skip Part One but pay attention after that, since more than a handful of the offbeat recipes sound like they’re worth a try.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Rouda

customer_reviews.title: This is Not Just a Diet
customer_reviews.text: As one of the millions of Americans who suffer from hypertension, I have been aware of the DASH diet for a while. I started it a few times and somehow always drifted back to my old ways. A few years ago I was diagnosed with lupus and I realized I had to change the way I eat. This book reminded me of the things I need to be aware of and how I should eat. It’s easy to read and gives all the reasons why the DASH diet works but it also has nearly 80 recipes that are simple and fast. This book can help save your life. The DASH diet works!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda J. Brody

customer_reviews.title: Dash Diet Made Easy
customer_reviews.text: This book is great for any Dash Diet beginner or anyone considering a dietary change for health purposes. It has all the information a Dash Diet beginner needs to start; the basics about the Dash Diet, how to implement healthy changes to your diet, and helpful recipes to get you started. I especially enjoyed Chapter two when the author provided a list of time and money saving cooking tips to help you get started. In this book, the focus is on hassle free implementation of healthier eating habits, not on unnecessary information that often sidetracks the reader in other diet books, subsequently making this book a quicker read and the information faster to put into practice.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Excellent & Easy Recipes!
customer_reviews.text: So far, the recipes in this book have been super easy to prepare and delicious! I was already somewhat familiar with the DASH diet, so there were no big surprises. If you are new to DASH, however, you will find some insightful information in the first section, including what you need to know before getting started, the science behind this diet, and foods to avoid. One thing that would have been immensely helpful would have been a two-week (or even a one-week) menu plan, complete with shopping list for people like me who are extremely busy. But, if you have the time to plan your menu and grocery lists, you’ll enjoy the dishes from this book!
customer_reviews.author: EHM

customer_reviews.title: Great recipes in under 5 minutes!
customer_reviews.text: After reading “The Quick & Easy DASH Diet,” I was excited to try a few of the 77 recipes that they offer in Part 2 of the book. DASH stands for Dietary Approaches to Stop Hypertension. I personally suffer from high blood pressure and was a bit worried that this diet book, would involve a complete removal of sodium products. It doesn’t. The daily diet allows for 2000 calories, per day, which is more than all other diets. I would recommend this book to those who want to learn to incorporate good foods, with great taste into their life style.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer A

customer_reviews.title: Rudimentary and repetitive
customer_reviews.text: Not being familiar with the DASH diet, I appreciated the brief explanation, although Chapter One was rather repetitive in covering the basics. Chapter Two contained some general information relevant to any diet, making me feel I was reading an entry-level cook book – an entry-level cook book without photos. While the DASH diet can be beneficial to a healthy lifestyle beyond the goal of reducing hypertension, there are few recipes suitable for a vegetarian or vegan. Of those, many seem extremely rudimentary, such as guacamole or fruit salad. The recipes look easy to follow, but then again, it’s not hard to chop up fruit and pour orange juice over it.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Lovely

customer_reviews.title: Super eating!
customer_reviews.text: This book had an amazing amount of low-sodium recipes! The first few chapters are fairly educational for someone who doesn’t know much about issues related to hypertension and high blood pressure; however, if you are considering this book, then you have some idea about this and are looking for healthy options. There are 77 low sodium recipes in this cookbook and each recipe tells you the amount of sodium, preparation time, and cook time. So, for someone who is looking to offset negative effects of high blood pressure, this cookbook does a nice job of quantifying the healthy choices. Instead of salt, there are varieties of other spices that can be used to make food taste really great!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Perkins

customer_reviews.title: A Smart Change for the Diet
customer_reviews.text: The Quick and Easy Dash Diet For anyone who might suffer from Pre-Hypertension, this book is a must. With a straightforward, easy plan, this book helps explain the diet that will help keep you healthy and on the go. From getting your mornings started right with Creamy Strawberry Oatmeal, you could Spicy Chicken-Chipotle Soup for lunch and Greek Turkey Burgers for dinner while never feeling deprived. There are even easy dessert recipes, the Chocolate Mug cake is sure to be a favorite!
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: Good way to start lowering blood pressure
customer_reviews.text: The Quick & Easy DASH Diet has made my initial foray into curbing high blood pressure easier. I appreciate that the recipes are tasty, and can be prepared in 30 minutes or less. Very necessary as a busy mom. I also liked that this book spent time going through the logic and reasoning behind the diet, as it’s never easy to change eating habits, and at least understanding why DASH is important helped me to get a better start to my revamped eating. It’s nice that they offer tips on still eating your favorite foods, too, but with reduced sodium. Makes it seem not so bad.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper's Delight

customer_reviews.title: A genuine diet for healthy living
customer_reviews.text: Developed by the National Institutes of Health (NIH), the DASH diet is comprised of low sodium foods designed to treat or prevent hypertension (high blood pressure). Incidentally, The Quick & Easy DASH Diet Cookbook (Rockridge Press) offers a simple, foolproof eating plan, which happens to optimize weight loss naturally and without any gimmicks. Dieters reap an added bonus with the assortment of foods highlighted in the plan- all rich in essential nutrients, including potassium, calcium and magnesium. Moreover, this comprehensive and very readable book outlines over seventy easy-to-follow recipes with tasty and easily stocked ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: P. Laudato

customer_reviews.title: Quick Delicious DASH
customer_reviews.text: This book primarily addresses the DASH diet to help prevent/treat hypotension. It’s actually an excellent guide for anyone using nutrition in their healthcare arsenal. Advice is designed to build solid healthy eating habits. It covers everything you need from how to plan your grocery list and shop without temptation while saving money. I especially like that recipes include yummy snacks, no alien ingredients, and nothing takes more than 30 minutes to prepare! Being super health conscious, I didn’t like that a few recipes use canola oil (GMO/trans fats). I prefer olive or avocado oil instead! This book was a gift I will share with my mom.
customer_reviews.author: S. Brigitte Miller

customer_reviews.title: I don't have health problems, but I like the recipes
customer_reviews.text: The recipes in this common-sense cookbook use everyday ingredients and use preparation methods that are popular now. Some of the recipes, such as the ones for breakfast, require very little preparation and cooking time. The fanciest dishes, such as Artichoke-Stuffed Chicken Breasts with Goat Cheese, only take up to 30 minutes to prepare and cook. The recipes fall into the categories of Breakfast, Snacks and Appetizers, Soups and Salads, Entrees, and Desserts. Seriously, all the recipes look as if they would taste really good. I’m not saying this on an empty stomach. I made the Morning Muesli and was pleased with the result.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia F.

customer_reviews.title: An Amazingly Creative HEALTH Cookbook
customer_reviews.text: Who says dieting for health purposes has to be boring? This is an amazing cookbook. The recipes are wonderfully creative. You can start out the day with date-sweetened chocolate oatmeal, lunch on baby spinach salad with apples, pecans, and maple vinaigrette and treat yourself to a dinner of grilled halibut with tropical fruit salsa or Greek turkey burgers. And then there is a dessert called “banana-nut wontons with bourbon caramel”. The DASH diet was designed by medical experts to help people lower their blood pressure and encourage eating lots of fruits, vegetables, low-fat and nonfat dairy, lean proteins, and whole grains. The secret of how to do this is what this cookbook is all about!
customer_reviews.author: Elissa Meininger

customer_reviews.title: Low Sodium = Delicious? Yes, it's possible!
customer_reviews.text: “The DASH diet was designed primarily to address the problem of hypertension. It is an eating plan that is low in sodium.” Plain and simple, yet yum and delicious, this book is a treasure of easy to make and quick to prepare tasty and scrumptious looking dishes. I liked the section on what to eat on a typical 2,000-calorie-per-day DASH daily meal plan, and I like the breakdown of how much. Did I say they also have “foods to avoid” and “foods to enjoy?” I like the way every recipe is organized, giving me a breakdown of calories, sodium, prep and cooking times. I plan on trying the recipes and also giving the book as a gift. Five stars!
customer_reviews.author: Nasko D. Lazarov

customer_reviews.title: Great recipes!
customer_reviews.text: What a great find. The Quick and Easy DASH Diet Cookbook is a fabulous resource for people needing to knock down their sodium levels. Anyone who has ever read the labeling on pre packaged food will know the disgustingly high levels of sodium to be found. As I have a family proclivity toward high blood pressure I found it very refreshing to find fun recipe ideas that cut back on sodium but not on the taste. You get a little overview of what the DASH diet is, but the really good seller are the recipes. And there's the added bonus of weight loss. Who doesn't want to improve body health and lose weight eating great food?
customer_reviews.author: Shauna P.

customer_reviews.title: Great Taste, Healthy and Low Prep Time?  Yes, Please!
customer_reviews.text: Face it - low fat, low salt, low sugar diets can be really boring and tasteless, but millions must succumb to them to get and remain healthy. If you are "cheating" because you must have taste, then you must get this cookbook! From breakfasts, to snacks, to entrees and desserts, there are just amazing recipes that will "sell" you on eating healthy. And some of the combinations are things you would never think of. Curried sweet potato soup? I love it! The best part? Every recipe is quick and easy, and that works for me! Great introductory information about diet and health; amazing fast and economical recipes; and less time in the kitchen - I am sold!
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Kaczmarski

customer_reviews.title: Great Intro Book to the DASH Diet!
customer_reviews.text: This book provides a good, simple introduction to the DASH Diet. There’s an overview of the benefits/philosophy of the diet, as well as foods to avoid and those to embrace. The recipes are simple and easy to follow. Some of my favorites include the Zucchini Parmesan Chips, Creamy Sundried Tomato and Garlic Sauce and the section on desserts. I’m partial to sweets, so the dessert section was especially appealing. The recipes include calorie and sodium counts. Although the book doesn’t include suggested daily meal plans, they’re easy enough to pull together from the recipe lists.
customer_reviews.author: slong

customer_reviews.title: The Quick + Easy Dash Diet Cookbook
customer_reviews.text: The Quick + Easy Dash Diet Cookbook can serve as a guideline to making your way to a smart, effective and healthy lifestyle change for life. The book emphasizes the importance of planning out your meals and making lists for shopping to help you ease into following this diet. By following the information and delicious recipes in this book you will not only lower your blood pressure but you will also reduce your chances of having heart attacks and strokes. You will also find yourself losing weight, sleeping better, having more energy and thinking more clearly. I look forward to trying more of the recipes.
customer_reviews.author: JLA

customer_reviews.title: Recipes and Reasons
customer_reviews.text: This cookbook goes beyond recipes, including science explained for the diet proposed. The authors claim that this diet can help with a number of conditions and weight loss, it has a specific focus of managing and reducing hyper-tension, or high blood pressure. Focus of these recipes decreases sodium, fats and sweetners, while increasing intake of calcium, magnesium and potassium. The recipes include a great variety of foods and surprising combinations, like the chocolate brownies that include black beans. The recipes are designed for ease, prepared in less that 30 minutes. The 77 refers to Part !! of the book: the recipes. 77 recipes offered that uses the strategies explained in the first part of the book.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Read this book if you truly want to be healthy
customer_reviews.text: I love to eat food that is good for you and taste good, and this book covered all of that and more. It discussed the basics of a healthy diet , and also how to save time and money when eating healthy. It mentioned many reasons for following this diet, or rather this way of life eating pattern. Half of the book is filled with recipes that look easy to make and make your mouth water just reading them. This book will definitely be a welcome addition to year bookcase as well as your kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Pat E

customer_reviews.title: An easy dash to this cookbook
customer_reviews.text: This book offers quick and easy recipes for anyone on the DASH diet and for anyone who wants to eat healthy. The recipes are super fast, low in salt, sugar, and fat, and high in health. After a short introduction, the book offers smart, money-saving ways to think about organizing, shopping, and cooking. While some of these things are obvious - like don't go to the supermarket on an empty stomach - I was still glad to read them and be reminded of the simple things that have made/broken previous diets. I only wish this book had pictures and had put together a weekly meal plan for me to follow.
customer_reviews.author: Alissab99

customer_reviews.title: No to Crash diet and Yes to DASH diet
customer_reviews.text: The book indicates the benefits of DASH diet that stands for Dietary Approaches to Stop Hypertension. This book is uniquely made by the National Institutes of Health for those that are sufferring from hypertension. The recipes are significantly to treat or prevent hypertension and other illnesses such as cancer, heart diseases, diabetes and etc. Many recipe books nowadays are all about diet techniques and recipes for general use but these books failed to include recipes for people that have hypertension and such. This book also contains the 77 easy recipes that we could easily incorporate to our daily meal plan. Overall this book is a must read one.
customer_reviews.author: genilyn

customer_reviews.title: Some helpful recipes
customer_reviews.text: The introduction didn’t really explain as much as I would have liked about the theory behind the diet or how it compares to other diets. On the other hand, this is probably a diet that many people were recommended to by their doctors, so it may not need an extensive introduction. I think following the diet completely would be hard since it tries to reduce both salty and sweet foods. The recipes themselves weren’t brilliant, but there were some that showed how a normally unhealthy food could be made a part of the diet — for instance, the cheesecake bites. I thought clever recipes like that made the diet seem less strict and more manageable.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten B.

customer_reviews.title: Dietary Approach To Good Health
customer_reviews.text: What I like about this DASH diet book is that it isn’t actually a diet; it’s a lifestyle change. Instead of treating high blood pressure and cholesterol with medication, DASH provides you with easy ways to stop hypertension by changing how you eat. This book is written very simply without a lot of medical term mumbo jumbo. You get advice on how to plan ahead and how to incorporate this new diet into your life, easy. It has great yummy recipes like banana peanut butter smoothies, and zucchini parmesan chips. It even allows for an alcoholic drink every day. Yay! Excited for a way to be healthy without the medication.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: A great resource for the Dash Diet
customer_reviews.text: The Quick Easy Dash Diet Cookbook is worth the read. The recipes look really tasty, and there are great options for any meal time. The book also helps make the Dash Diet doable, with an explanation of the importance of the diet, types for choosing the right foods, and helpful daily hints. It also has a section that gives tips on making grocery shopping trips more effective and less of a stress when on a diet. Since the Dash Diet is more of a lifestyle change rather than a quick fix diet, this book is makes it easy to stay on track. The Quick Easy Dash Diet Cookbook is a great resource
customer_reviews.author: Elena Nagamatsu

customer_reviews.title: DASH Diet Cookbook
customer_reviews.text: DASH stands for Dietary Approaches to Stop Hypertension. Since I have this condition, I'm always looking for easy solutions. This cookbook offers 77 quick and tasty recipes that incorporate the DASH approach to healthy eating. It gives kick off information in starting the diet, food lists, how to shop and full flavor recipe options. This isn't just another fad diet. It's a lifestyle shift for improved longevity, health and feeling good. It's backed by highly respected medical research centers like Johns Hopkins and Duke universities. If you want to treat and prevent hypertension in more natural ways, you'll love this resource!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Lee

customer_reviews.title: DASH for success!
customer_reviews.text: If you suffer from hypertension, then this DASH diet guide can definitely act as your first step towards healthier living. This book is also highly recommended for those looking to lose weight or to prevent various cancers. Divided into two parts, the first part will help you get familiar with the basics of the diet, while the second part has 77 recipes you can incorporate into your diet. There are also cooking tips that are provided, which will help you prepare meals. With extensive research done on this diet, you can be sure to achieve your health goals. My favorite is the “Super-Fast Breakfast Burrito.”
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Great New Book!
customer_reviews.text: If you have hypertension, this cookbook was literally made for you. DASH stands for Dietary Approaches to Stop Hypertension. The book's recipes call for low-sodium foods high in calcium, potassium and magnesium- all believed to lower blood pressure. Those without hypertension can also use the book as a weight loss guide. Part One of the book aids you in the beginning steps of a DASH diet, telling you what foods to throw out and which to buy on your next grocery stop. Part Two offers 77 delicious recipe ideas that will leave you wondering if you are even on a diet.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Friar

customer_reviews.title: What is your health worth?
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that there is a cook book that helps with hypertension. The fact that it give portion sizes and a description, like about the size of a deck of cards, because, honestly, I don't have a scale hanging around my kitchen to tell me how big 3 ounces is. The variety sounds delicious and it tells you how to stay with the meal plan when at the store. The various health perks are a real win for me. The down fall is that shopping for whole and fresh food is more expensive than processed food. Still how much is your health worth in the end? Brittany C.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great health advice!
customer_reviews.text: Hypertension is a problem that effects millions. And that’s why a book like The Quick & Easy DASH diet cook book contains health advice that is absolutely vital. The “DASH” in the book’s title stands for dietary approaches to stop hypertension. But the dietary advice contained in the book is also very helpful for a wide range of health conditions. Best of all are the recipes that prove that great taste need not be sacrificed for the sake of healthy eating.
customer_reviews.author: David Copper

customer_reviews.title: Better Recipes than I Thought I Would Have!
customer_reviews.text: The recipes in this book are specifically for people that have or at risk for high blood pressure. My husbands’ doctors said he was at risk so I got the book to find some recipes that he might actually like. I tried the Mini Frittata Muffins and the whole family loved them. They were great! I will definitely be making these again, and there are plenty of other to try. I plan on trying the Super-Fast Breakfast Burrito tomorrow morning. I have already recommended this to my friend so that she can use the recipes to cook for her mother. Happy Cooking!
customer_reviews.author: Sin Sinsere

customer_reviews.title: Dash to the finish line of healthy living
customer_reviews.text: Are you ready for the 77 Dash? No I am not talking about a race that sounds like it should be televised for the Olympics! 77 Dash Diet recipe book, its only the guide to the finish line of starting the rest of your life. Yes that’s right this book isn’t just for the old and brown, the young or round, it's for anyone who wants to still eat good, feel good and look but with structure and moderation. So stop depriving yourself, liven yourself with the nutritious recipes and steps given in the 77 Dash Diet Recipe book. I promise you’ll beat the nay sayers to the finish line.
customer_reviews.author: brittany j fernandes

customer_reviews.title: Not a fad diet!
customer_reviews.text: There are so many fad diets that don’t yield sustainable results! Quick and Easy is really about a lifestyle change of eating that is easy and one that I want to stick with for years to come. There are tasty quick recipes included that not only save time, but are completely pleasing to the palate. I have long awaited a book of recipes that captures my desire to eat better and pleases my taste buds as well. This should be a staple in every kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: Problem Solved
customer_reviews.text: I dread going to the doctor and having the “blood pressure” discussion. I struggle with diets to lower salt intake and still have tasty foods. The DASH Diet Cookbook solves this problem. I find that some cookbooks only provide partial information and I’m left if the soup I just derailed my diet or the dish really works with barbecue. But the DASH Diet provides the sodium count with the calorie count, easily adjustable serving sizes and descriptions that can provide useful alternations/substitutes for their recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca J

customer_reviews.title: A good diet for hypertension with great recipies
customer_reviews.text: The first part of the book covers what a DASH diet is which is good for anyone who has hypertension. I liked how they also included money and time saving tips. The second part of the book gives you recipes. The DASH diet uses mainly fresh foods though you can substitute them for canned. They do advise you to read the nutrition labels carefully. Many of the recipes use items you already have in your pantry.
customer_reviews.author: Luna R. Exfortito

customer_reviews.title: Hypertension or not, these are some tasty recipes.
customer_reviews.text: If you or anyone you care about suffers from or is at risk of hypertension, this is the cookbook for you! Although the introductory information is a little on the repetitive side, it is nonetheless a great resource for anyone looking for more information about what foods are ideal for a healthful, low-sodium diet. The recipes in the back half of the book are excellent as well. I have no issues with hypertension but I am still definitely going to try some of these recipes, especially the “Maple-Cinnamon Oatmeal Pancakes”, the “Curried Zucchini and Goat Cheese Rolls”, and “Spicy Chicken-Chipotle Tortilla Soup.”
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Practical and Creative
customer_reviews.text: The Dash Diet Cookbook addresses a health problem that now affects approximately 1 billion worldwide: Hypertension. The book not only provides recipes and helpful tips for the short-term, but it also makes for a holistic eating strategy for the longer term. The Dash diet encourages low-sodium eating, as well as limited fat and sugar consumption. In their turn, the diet promotes high-potassium and high-fiber eating, manifest in recipes for morning noon and night.
customer_reviews.author: Kaleigh cohen

customer_reviews.title: DASH to a healthy you!
customer_reviews.text: The DASH Diet Cookbook is ideal for those looking to lower blood pressure. As a bonus, the diet promotes physical health in a number of other ways, and can be used as a means of weight-loss, too. As one might expect from a cookbook primarily designed for lowering blood pressure, the recipes are all low in sodium. Ingredients are affordable, and are mostly limited to fruits and vegetables, low-fat dairy products, whole grains, and lean proteins. A variety of different foods keeps the cookbook fun and interesting.
customer_reviews.author: W. A. Genre

customer_reviews.title: Easy and thorough way to manage your diet.
customer_reviews.text: With the quick and easy DASH diet cookbook you can manage your diet as well as your wallet. Following the guidelines set in this easy to follow and informative book you can cut back on cholesterol, over-eating, and over-spending. While pointing out the easiest ways to do this, it sets them in an easy to read and follow format. With this medically researched diet you're guaranteed to feel more energetic, awake, and over all in better shape. Recommended to anyone who needs a healthy lifestyle change or just wants to improve their eating habits.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Great Recipe and Lifestyle Book
customer_reviews.text: The Quick & Easy DASH Diet Cookbook offers simple and easy recipes that support a healthy lifestyle. Developed by the National Institute of Health, this book gives more than just a flash in the pan diet. It recommendations go beyond simply helping lower your blood pressure, as provides various ways to save you time and money. With a wide variety of recipes, this book will keep you busy and excited for your next meal. I definitely recommend this book to anyone who has hypertension or wants to enjoy a healthier menu.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Mike

customer_reviews.title: Really helpful, makes adjusting my diet seem very possible
customer_reviews.text: One of my big hurdles in approaching any diet I've done is thinking there has to be this huge overhaul of what I eat. This book really helped me see that little adjustments to my diet can have a big impact. I love the different levels of DASH diets and the really easy ways of counting the sodium. Some of the recipes are helpful, but I more liked how they got me thinking about how I can adjust recipes I already have and fit them into this new direction. Either way, I’ll be trying the zucchini pancakes this weekend. I love zucchini bread. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Cyd Zeigler Jr

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need!
customer_reviews.text: Even though this book is meant for people who have hypertension (DASH stands for “Dietary Approaches to Stop Hypertension”) I still found it to be full of good, useful advice. The recipes in this book are meant to help you lose weight and lower cholesterol in addition to defending against various diseases, and who wouldn’t want that? In addition to lots of delicious foods to try that cover all three meals plus desserts, this book includes tips on how to shop smart, save money, and plan for the future. All in all, “The Quick & Easy DASH Diet Cookbook” contains lots of great information that would be perfect for just about anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: An easy way to start a good lifestyle change
customer_reviews.text: This is a great book to learn about the dash diet. The recipes are easy to follow.
customer_reviews.author: lilangelsmom

customer_reviews.title: DASH Diet Positive Lifestyle Change
customer_reviews.text: Chances are, if you are obese, have high blood pressure, elevated cholesterol levels and/or diabetes and see a doctor regularly, you are already aware of the DASH [Dietary Approaches to Stop Hypertension] Diet. If not, then get ready for an new lifestyle. Think ground turkey, salmon, sweet potatoes, non-stick spray, salsa and lots of fresh fruit and veggies. Toss that frying pan and go baked or grilled. There are 77 quick and easy breakfast, snack, appetizer, soup, salad, entree, and desert recipes. Included is a listing of health website resources.
customer_reviews.author: mary mag

customer_reviews.title: The Dash Diet made easy!
customer_reviews.text: The Quick and Easy Dash Diet Cookbook, truly lives up to its name! Anyone who wants to try a healthier way of eating should take a look at this book. The Dash Diet is mostly intended for people who suffer from or are at risk for high blood pressure, however, everyone can benefit from this change in diet. The Dash diet focuses on eating mostly fresh fruits and veggies and this cookbook has interesting ways to prepare them and incorporate them into your daily life.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Amely

customer_reviews.title: An adjustment for healthy living
customer_reviews.text: Its an adjustment, I tried one of the recipes for the first time and it was fairly good. Its an acquired taste but I'm trying the dash diet for health reason
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Smith

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: The DASH diet is a wonderful method of eating! It seems to take parts of other diets and merge them into one, non-restrictive, common-sense approach to a healthy diet. There are plenty great tips for shopping, like freezing overripe fruit and sticking to the perimeter of a grocery store, as well as cooking advice, like using a slow cookers and using leftovers in creative ways. This diet is easy and inexpensive to follow, a win-win for anyone trying to lower their blood pressure or keep their weight in check!
customer_reviews.author: Brigit High

customer_reviews.title: The rules are easy and the recipes are good!
customer_reviews.text: The first section of this book is very helpful explaining what to know about the DASH diet, giving lists of specific servings of food groups to eat each day and what to avoid. I also like that you can have splurge items like sugar and alcohol, just in moderation. The best part was how to buy these foods on a budget, which is always my biggest skepticism of specific diets because I end up spending a lot of money on groceries. The recipe selection is quite extensive as well.
customer_reviews.author: Claire M.

customer_reviews.title: Had a few good recipes hat worked for me
customer_reviews.text: My wife usually cooks the meals, but after I got this cool book I decided to try a few recipes. I let my wife take the day off on cooking and I made the Maple-Cinnamon Pancakes for my wife and daughter and they loved them. We have been looking for ways to eat healthier so when I ran across this book I was interested in trying a few recipes. I really liked some of the recipes and would definitely recommend them to friends that would be interested.
customer_reviews.author: Waikiki

customer_reviews.title: Tasty Recipes
customer_reviews.text: I just finished The Quick + Easy DASH Diet Cookbook. I was surprised at how tasty they sound. These recipes are a great way to cook without salt. Each recipe has the sodium conveniently listed. I learned about different spices I can use to flavor my meals without the usual salt. My favorite recipe though, was Surprisingly Healthy Brownies with the surprise ingredient. Delicious! One of the best tips was ‘fill your cart from the perimeter of the store first’. I would recommend this book for anyone who has concerns about their blood pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Lind

customer_reviews.title: A great way to get started!
customer_reviews.text: This book is excellent for beginners. It introduces the Dash diet in a very easy to understand way and reasons why the Dash diet can be useful. The book helps you to plan a shopping list and gives information on ingredients that would be needed. The book is broken down into all the different meals of the day, with each section containing several recipes for each meal. This is an excellent book for someone who is in need of a new diet to deal with hypertension.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

product_meta.title: Quick & Easy Dash Diet Cookbook: 77 Dash Diet Recipes Made in Minutes
